attributes.action: Expedited vaccination program for immediate family of health care workers
attributes.additional_details: Expedited vaccination program for the family of health care workers
attributes.background: Family of healthcare workers that live with them are also in danger , the health care workers might be vaccinated but still would be able the transfer the virus to their families , specially their partners.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569549
